projects.name: AtSpy
paragraph: AtSpy provides developers with standalone test spies for JavaScript.
AtSpy is powered by TypeScript & Decorators (ES7), has no dependencies and works with any unit testing framework.

projects.name: InversifyJS
paragraph: An open-source lightweight (4KB) IoC container written in TypeScript.

projects.name: www.unsc.info
paragraph: A Halo universe wiki website, I created this site because I'm a big fan of the Halo series.
